subject: Marathon Running
New York City Marathon
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Meb Keflezighi plans to run both the New York City Marathon on Nov. 6 and the United States Olympic trials 10 weeks later, but many other top Americans will run only the trials.
snippet: Meb Keflezighi plans to run both the New York City Marathon on Nov. 6 and the United States Olympic trials 10 weeks later, but many other top Americans will run only the trials.
